amendment.description: Amendment requires debt relief agencies to make certain disclosures to consumer debtors and includes provisions to prevent deceptive and fraudulent advertising practices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require debt relief agencies to make certain disclosures to debtors and include a "debtor's bill of rights.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (VA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 373 - 47 (Roll no. 111).
